medical_history.chief_complaint: Periumbilical abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began last night while playing a game with her granddaughter. She has never experienced this pain before. Throughout the day, she felt achy all over and spent most of it in bed. No associated fever noted. She vomited undigested food, with the last bowel movement being a formed stool yesterday. The pain worsened with movement and was relieved with morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Adult onset diabetes mellitus, previous hysterectomy, coronary artery disease, gastroesophageal reflux disease, hypercholesterolemia, hypertension, knee pain, umbilical hernia, inferior myocardial infarction.
